summary: Mage home in Winterhold.  Includes crafting for mages, storage and displays.  Access to/from room in Mages College.
descriptionHtml:
[center][left][/left][font=Verdana][color=#00ffff][size=6]Winter Haven
[size=3]by LODYN
[/size][/size][/color][/font][/center][center][/center][font=Verdana][color=#00ffff][size=6][size=3][center][size=4]Beautiful home for Mages located in the town of Winterhold.[/size] [/center]
[/size][/size][/color][/font][font=Verdana][color=#00ffff][size=6][size=4]Tired of your drab room at the college?  Then investigate and find a secret passage to a lovely home left by the last mage to live in this room.  You will discover a fully decorated and supplied home which includes: 
[/size][size=3][center]All crafting stations including staff crafting. 
Great displays for those prizes found in your travels. 
Room for your follower.


[color=#ff0000][size=4]Required Files (This means that your game will not start properly if you do not have these files):[/size] 
Dragonborn DLC
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18340/?]General Stores - storage resource for packrats by [b]Harvey2112[/b][/url] (Runtime only required)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32550/?]General Displays by [b]Tueffel[/b][/url]  (Main file and General Stores Patch)


Before activating this file, please empty wardrobes in player room at college so you do not lose any stored items.


[/color]
Your library area includes displays for Masks (large shelf on left), Devine Amulets (display case on left), and dragon claws (smaller middle shelf with dragon statue on top).  Bug jar display is on wall shelf in alchemy area and Hold shields are on map in armory.  See images.[/center]
[/size]

[/size][/color][/font]




[center][/center][center][/center][center][/center][center][/center][center][/center][center][/center]
author: Lodyn
